commits.message: Updated README.md.
Setting locale dynamically.
Assigned cmd[1] to returncode for better readability.
Made several improvements to the installer/pkgbuild scripts and updated the README.
Actually exiting install script now if LAUNCHD_PATH doesn't exist.

Merge pull request #3 from futureimperfect/break-fix

Break fix
Changed formatting of email message to be more readable.
Added missing break statement that was causing version value to get overwritten.

Merge pull request #2 from futureimperfect/installer-script

Report plist and Installer Script
Fixed a bug with the to addresses used in the SMTP headers and the sendmail arguments. Updated README.
Added better SMTP exception handling.
Fixed path to postinstall script in pkg_build.sh. Duh.
Updated path to recipe_list, removed default value for UserName key, making sure postinstall is executable, reformatted print statement.
Added launchd UserName option to cron2launchd.py.
Reformatted __init__ def in autopkg_notify.py and started to add better exception handling to the postinstall script.
Renamed postinstall.py so it will work, changed a few things in postinstall, added *.plist to .gitignore.
Fixed an error in install script. Forgot to include () after os.getcwd.
git rm'ed deleted files.
Made a lot of architectural changes and changes to how AutoPkgNotify is deployed, (a custom PKG can now be created).
Made a print statement more readable.
Made autopkgnotify.py more PEP8 compatible and replaced use of deprecated .has_key() method with 'in'.
Fixed some bugs with recipe_list and subprocess handling.
Started adding support for using AutoPkg's --report-plist option instead of parsing the output of autopkg run to check for new downloads.

Merge pull request #1 from futureimperfect/logging

Improved logging and added some more docstrings.
Improved logging and added some more docstrings.
Changed log location for LaunchD plist. Also updated .gitignore and the PKG.
Added several improvements to postinstall.py, fixed small typo in README, and updated the pkg installer.
Set the StartCalendarInterval key to 3am daily. This was set to 18:10 for testing.
Made a bunch-o-changes. Added docs, tested on fur-real systems, etc. Probably still a ton of bugs that I'm going to encounter, which may lead to architectural changes.
Added a conditional to prevent TLS and authentication from being required unless configured. Commented on these in settings.py.
Changed path to p.txt in settings.py and added p.txt to .gitignore.
Removed plain text assignment of fake password. Reading in text file instead.
Initialized version variable.
Added a conditional before assigning version.
git rm
Made a few improvements and changed the directory structure.
Started fleshing out the AutoPkgNotify script. Haven't tested anything yet.
Initial commit.
